page.title: 09TIR-PENTWYS
page.content:
Tir-pentwys
The main issue in this area at the moment is the{dumping of so-called {toxic waste}from the waste disposal company -{Re-Chem International}- in New Inn. This is an industrial waste disposal unit,{burning the back end of what {electric power stations, factories {etc., have used. The furnace at Re-Chem is kept lit for 24 hours a day, at a set high temperature. This is controlled by a computer. The ashes from this fire is them dumped at Tirpentwys. The smoke that comes out of the chimney stack gives off a very unpleasant smell over a large residential area, causing a great deal of concern.
